div.head:
4091. Robert Southey to John Rickman, [22 November 1823] Address: To/ J Rickman Esqre
Endorsement: RS to JR Nov. 1823
MS: Huntington Library, RS 445. ALS; 2p.
Unpublished.
Dating note: Southey visited Rickman on 28 November 1823; see Southey to William Peachy, 28 November 1823, Letter 4096. This letter dates from the previous Friday, 22 November 1823.
div.p: We will be with you before dinner on Friday, â€“ supposing Your hour to be not earlier than five. But as I have so many places of call in your quarter I may probably see you in the mean time.
Your note could not receive an earlier answer, as I am but just arrived from Streatham.
